iaik.pkcs.pkcs1

Class PKCS1AlgorithmParameterSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • iaik.pkcs.pkcs1.PKCS1AlgorithmParameterSpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.security.spec.AlgorithmParameterSpec
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MGF1ParameterSpec, RSAOaepPSourceParameterSpec, RSAPssSaltParameterSpec, RSASSAPkcs1v15ParameterSpec

    public class PKCS1AlgorithmParameterSpec
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.security.spec.AlgorithmParameterSpec
    PKCS#1 algorithm parameter specification. Super class that groups all parameter specifications that may be required by any of the RSA PKCS#1 algorithms.

    This class (and any of its sub classes) also maybe used to supply a SecureRandom object to a PKCS#1 algorithm implementation if required.

    Version:
    File Revision 6
